service_start.description: Time at which the on-demand transport service starts, in seconds

service_end.description: Time at which the on-demand transport service starts, in seconds

dispatch_period.description: Period of the periodic_greedy dispatcher, in seconds

user_alert.description: User delay of the periodic_greedy dispatcher, in seconds

stop_points_from.description: Indicates how stop points are generated

oneOf.description: Use the stop points of the global gtfs.
Use the requests locations (door to door).

routes.description: Route ids filter applied to the gtfs before selecting the service stop points.

pickup_time_window.description: Authorised delay after requested pickup time, in seconds

max_detour.description: Authorised detour factor from the direct trip

estimation_shortest_path.description: Boolean indicating whether a shortest path algorithm is used to compute the direct travel time. Otherwise, the euclidean distance multiplied to a distance factor and the estimated speed are used.

estimated_speed.description: Estimated speed of the on-demand vehicles, used to approximate path lengths, in m/s

estimated_pickup.description: Estimated wait for the pickup, as a percentage of the time window

estimated_detour.description: Estimated detour factor from the direct trip

estimated_dwell_time.description: Dwell time used for trip estimation
